gw.api.util

Class PhoneUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.util.PhoneUtil

  • public class PhoneUtil
extends Object
    Provides phone number validation and formatting routines. Based on Google's libphonenumber, basically proxying a lot of calls to libphonenumber for use in gosu.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PhoneCountryCode DefaultPhoneCountryCode
      This is the server-wide phone country code
      static boolean MultiRegionMode
      Returns true if AlwaysShowPhoneWidgetRegionCode is true in config.xml
      static PhoneCountryCode UserDefaultPhoneCountry
      Returns the user's default phone country, will fallback to the default server country if the user default phone country if it's null.

      static String formatIntl(PhoneCountryCode code, String phoneNumber, String extension)
      Convenience method to format emerald phone numbers
      static String formatWithLocalizableExtension(String input, PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
      Formats, with localizable extensions, a phone number string based on the country of origin. Warning: this string may not be parsable back into a GWPhoneNumber object and should be used with care.
      static String formatWithLocalizableExtensionForDisplay(String input, PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry, PhoneCountryCode originCountry)
      Formats the input based on the originCountry, which can be different than the parsing countryCode. This method allows for a localizable extension. Warning: The result may not be parsable back into a GWPhoneNumber
      static Country getCountry(PhoneCountryCode phoneCountryCode)
      Converts a PhoneCountryCode typekey to a Country typekey if possible

      Returns a numeric country code based on the Country typekey

      Returns a GWPhoneNumber object for the PrimaryPhoneValue

      Returns the user's default phone country, will fallback to the default server country if the user default phone country if it's null.
      static boolean isMultiRegionMode()
      Returns true if AlwaysShowPhoneWidgetRegionCode is true in config.xml
      static GWPhoneMatchType isNumberMatch(GWPhoneNumber first, GWPhoneNumber second)
      This method will attempt to determine a match type for two GWPhoneNumber objects. The valid return results are: EXACT_MATCH, same number NO_MATCH, not the same number SHORT_NSN_MATCH, short national subscriber match, 408-555-1212 will be a SHORT_NSN_MATCH with 650-555-1212. NSN_MATCH, national subscriber match NOT_A_NUMBER, error
      static boolean isPossibleNumber(String input, PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
      Returns true if the string parameter is possibly a phone number. Is possible is a much looser check than isValid
      static GWPhoneValidationResult isPossibleNumberWithReason(String input, PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
      Returns a GWPhoneValidationResult based on the given string input and the specified PhoneCountryCode typekey Possible return values are: IS_POSSIBLE INVALID INVALID_COUNTRY_CODE TOO_LONG TOO_SHORT
      static boolean isSame(GWPhoneNumber first, GWPhoneNumber second)
      Returns true if two GWPhoneNumber objects are the same. Basically calls equals() on GWPhoneNumber
      static boolean isValidExtension(String value)
      Checks if the extension is less than 8 digits long.
      static boolean isValidNumber(String number, PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
      Returns true if the string parameter is a valid number for a given country
      static boolean isValidNumber(String number)
      Returns true if the string parameter is a valid number in the default phone country code
      static boolean isViableNumber(String value)
      Checks if a string can be a viable phone number. Will use IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available, otherwise will check if the string contains a minimum set of digits required for a phone number and does not contain any extraneous characters outside of standard phone punctuations. This method is region independent. Is viable is even looser than isPossible.
      static boolean isViableNumberWithExtension(String value)
      Checks if a string can be a viable phone number. Will use IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available, otherwise will check if the string contains a minimum set of digits required for a phone number and does not contain any extraneous characters outside of standard phone punctuations. This method is region independent. Is viable is even looser than isPossible.
      static String localizedFormat(GWPhoneNumber number, PhoneCountryCode countryCode)
      Outputs a localized extension pattern if applicable
      static String normalize(String value)
      Normalizes a phone number, will use the IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available. Otherwise will strip out all non-numeric characters with the exception of '+' or '*'.
      static GWPhoneNumber parse(String input, PhoneCountryCode defaultCountry)
      Parses a phone number string based on a default country and returns a GWPhoneNumber object.

      • convertAlphaCharacters

        String convertAlphaCharacters(String input)
        This method will convert alphanumeric characters into a numeric phone number. 1-800-CALL-SAM will convert 1-800-225-5726.
        Parameters:
        input - Input phone numbers containing alpha-numeric characters
        Returns:
        A fully numeric phone number

      • findNumbersInText

        List<String> findNumbersInText(String input,
                             PhoneCountryCode countryCode)
        Searches the input string for phone numbers, returns a list of phone numbers found in the String.
        Parameters:
        input - The input string to be parsed
        countryCode - The expected country code for the phone numbers
        Returns:
        A possibly empty list of found phone numbers.

      • formatWithLocalizableExtension

        String formatWithLocalizableExtension(String input,
                                    PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
        Formats, with localizable extensions, a phone number string based on the country of origin. Warning: this string may not be parsable back into a GWPhoneNumber object and should be used with care.

        Returns:
        A country typekey if it's a valid region code, otherwise it will return ZZ.

      • isNumberMatch

        GWPhoneMatchType isNumberMatch(GWPhoneNumber first,
                             GWPhoneNumber second)
        This method will attempt to determine a match type for two GWPhoneNumber objects. The valid return results are: EXACT_MATCH, same number NO_MATCH, not the same number SHORT_NSN_MATCH, short national subscriber match, 408-555-1212 will be a SHORT_NSN_MATCH with 650-555-1212. NSN_MATCH, national subscriber match NOT_A_NUMBER, error
        Parameters:
        first - First GWPhoneNumber
        second - Second GWPhoneNumber
        Returns:
        A GWPhoneMatchType based on the two phone numbers

        boolean isPossibleNumber(String input,
                       PhoneCountryCode phoneCountry)
        Returns true if the string parameter is possibly a phone number. Is possible is a much looser check than isValid

        input -
        phoneCountry -
        Returns:

      • isValidNumber

        boolean isValidNumber(String number)
        Returns true if the string parameter is a valid number in the default phone country code
        Parameters:
        number - phone number
        Returns:
        true if valid, false if not valid

      • isViableNumber

        boolean isViableNumber(String value)
        Checks if a string can be a viable phone number. Will use IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available, otherwise will check if the string contains a minimum set of digits required for a phone number and does not contain any extraneous characters outside of standard phone punctuations. This method is region independent. Is viable is even looser than isPossible.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        Whether or not the string is a viable phone number

      • isViableNumberWithExtension

        boolean isViableNumberWithExtension(String value)
        Checks if a string can be a viable phone number. Will use IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available, otherwise will check if the string contains a minimum set of digits required for a phone number and does not contain any extraneous characters outside of standard phone punctuations. This method is region independent. Is viable is even looser than isPossible.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        Whether or not the string is a viable phone number

                     PhoneCountryCode countryCode)
        Outputs a localized extension pattern if applicable
        Parameters:
        number - PhoneNumber to be formatted
        countryCode - PhoneNumberFormat
        Returns:
        Formatted string

      • normalize

        String normalize(String value)
        Normalizes a phone number, will use the IPhoneNormalizerPlugin if available. Otherwise will strip out all non-numeric characters with the exception of '+' or '*'.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        A normalized phone number

        Returns:
